briefTitle: Effect of Education on Breast Cancer Fear and Health Beliefs
officialTitle: The Effect of Education About Breast Cancer and Breast Self- Examination on Breast Cancer Fear and Health Beliefs: Randomized Controlled Trial
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Being over 20 years old
* not having a history of breast cancer
* not being in the lactation process
* not having a communication barrier
* volunteering to participate in the study

Exclusion Criteria:

* having a history of breast cancer
* having a communication barrier
* being in the lactation process
* not volunteering to participate in the study
